title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 4 points:

2 point: For P1(x)

1 point: For P1(1.9)

P1(x) = 80 + 128(x - 2), so h(1.9) ≈ P1(1.9) = 67.2

1 point: P1(1.9) < h(1.9) with reason

P1(1.9) < h(1.9) since h' is increasing on the interval 1 ≤ x ≤ 3.
descriptions:
The response earns none of the following points:

2 point: For P1(x)

1 point: For P1(1.9)

P1(x) = 80 + 128(x - 2), so h(1.9) ≈ P1(1.9) = 67.2

1 point: P1(1.9) < h(1.9) with reason

P1(1.9) < h(1.9) since h' is increasing on the interval 1 ≤ x ≤ 3.
